Sentencas: Alkali metal doped strontium meta-silicate, a highly conductive system, is being studied as an alternative to solid electrolyte for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Polymorph co-existence and its implication on transport dynamics in monomer and trimer strontium meta-silicate

Sentencas: Its high electrical conductivity is attributed to its structure and dopant strategies.
Titulo: Polymorph co-existence and its implication on transport dynamics in monomer and trimer strontium meta-silicate

Sentencas: Based on the recent reports, it was observed that it can exist in multiple forms depending upon synthesis route and conditions.

Sentencas: The structural analysis showed that for the samples prepared via solid state reaction (SSR) route, the compound contains multiple phases simultaneously irrespective of the temperature and configuration.
Titulo: Polymorph co-existence and its implication on transport dynamics in monomer and trimer strontium meta-silicate

Sentencas: The present work showed the co-existence and stability of three phases of meta-silicate synthesised via SSR even at high temperatures.
Titulo: Polymorph co-existence and its implication on transport dynamics in monomer and trimer strontium meta-silicate

Sentencas: The co-existence of multiple phases has led to the enhancement of conductivity by two orders of magnitude in intermediate temperature range of operation for SOFCs.
Titulo: Polymorph co-existence and its implication on transport dynamics in monomer and trimer strontium meta-silicate
